title: About Me
content: Welcome to my portfolio! I am Aitor Ibarra, a talented full stack developer with extensive experience in building robust and scalable applications using React, Next.js, .NET, and Testing. I have a passion for creating innovative solutions to complex problems, and I am dedicated to delivering high-quality software that meets the unique needs of each client.

As a developer, I have honed my skills in a variety of programming languages and frameworks, including React, Next.js, .NET, TypeScript, and more. I excel at working with clients to understand their requirements and translate those into clean, efficient code that delivers results. I am also well-versed in testing methodologies and am committed to ensuring that all software I deliver is thoroughly tested and validated.

Whether you need a custom web application, a mobile app, or a desktop software solution, I have the expertise and experience to deliver outstanding results. I am always up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the industry, which enables me to provide clients with cutting-edge solutions that meet their unique needs.

If you're looking for a talented and dedicated developer who can help you bring your ideas to life, look no further than me, Aitor Ibarra. Contact me today to learn more about my services and to discuss your next project.
